title: Nawdm (1992) Genesis Portion
description: Nawdm is a Gur language of Togo and Ghana. There are about 8000 speakers in Ghana and 200 000 speakers in Togo.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Nawdm
language.area: Kara region, Niamtougou area, Doufelgou Prefecture; Central and Plateau regions, Sotouboua, Ogou, and Haho prefectures; important minority in Lom√©. Also in Ghana.
